info.title: Homebrew Disc Loader
info.author: Sierradev
info.details:
Load homebrew applications from regular ISO9660 DVDs using this program.
Make sure the programs are named boot.dol. You can have more than one program on a disc, just put them in different directories (subdirectories are allowed too). The program will display a menu with all programs on the disc. Add meta.xml (HBC-format) to the directories for friendly program names and descriptions.
	
Author:
Sierradev (projects@sierradev.org) - www.sierradev.org

Thanks to: shagkur (DOL loading), joedj (pointing out ISO9660 devoptab), Duhow (betatester) and everyone on #wiidev!
